name: Universe Manager
description:
The Universe just started and will end with the inevitable Heat Death of the Universe.
Until then your job is to keep it alive for as long as possible. Keep aliens alive by moving them from planet to planet matching their needs in order for them to not start dying. Avoid wars that would further harm them and hurt their planets even more. But above all else, don't worry to much after all the Universe will just begin itself a new.

This Game is a mini management game for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. 

A mini management game where your job is too keep aliens alive for as long as possible. Match their desired planets and keep them from going to war at each other

Use the left mouse button to drag aliens from one planet to the other, and when there is a need for more planets press "E". However, expand too much or lose to many aliens and the Universe will die even sooner then intended.
